name: HashiCorp Vault
description: Integrate with HashiCorp Vault to read, list, write and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Read Secret
tools.description: Read a secret from HashiCorp Vault at a given path. Supports KV v1 and v2 engines. Returns secret key-value pairs.

tools.name: List Secrets
tools.description: List secret keys at a given path in HashiCorp Vault. Returns a list of key names (not values).

tools.name: Write Secret
tools.description: Write a secret to HashiCorp Vault at a given path. Provide key-value pairs as the secret data.

tools.name: List Mounts
tools.description: List all secret engine mounts in HashiCorp Vault. Returns mount paths, types, and descriptions.

tools.name: Get Health
tools.description: Check the health status of the HashiCorp Vault server. Returns initialization, seal status, and version info.
